alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Greeley; Hall; Howard; Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 23 at 4:27PM CDT until October 23 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Greeley County in central Nebraska... Western Nance County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Western Merrick County in central Nebraska... Howard County in central Nebraska... Northwestern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wolbach to near Farwell to 8 miles southeast of Poole, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... St. Paul, Cairo, Dannebrog, Wolbach, Elba, Farwell, Cushing and Boelus. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Greeley; Hall; Howard; Merrick; Nance
